title: Spit That Out!: The Overly Informed Parent's Guide to Raising Children in the Age of Environmental Guilt
description: From BPA in baby bottles and asbestos in crayons to misleading “natural” labels - it can despair even the most steadfast parent. Lighthearted yet authoritative, Spit That Out! cuts through the information overload, sorts cloth from disposable and empowers readers to make simple but impactful changes.
author: Paige Wolf
